title: Discover the Services and Benefits of Our Educational Center

daycare.title: Weekend Daycare
daycare.content:
A safe and welcoming space designed to care for little ones while parents attend work, personal, or family commitments.
Children participate in age-appropriate recreational and educational activities, fostering their development in a caring and warm environment.

schedule.title: Open from 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM
schedule.content:
We offer extended hours as an optional service to support families with demanding work schedules.
Regular classes start at 8:00 AM, but from 6:00 AM, children can enjoy a safe space with supervised activities
that make their arrival at school a gradual and comfortable process.
This additional service provides flexibility and peace of mind for parents in need.

summerCamp.title: Summer and Christmas Camp
summerCamp.content:
Special programs combining fun and learning during the holidays.
Children enjoy creative activities, games, sports, and workshops that promote social skills,
teamwork, and personal discovery, all in a safe and dynamic environment.

homework.title: Homework Room
homework.content:
A calm and supervised environment where students can do their schoolwork with guidance from trained staff.
This service helps reinforce their knowledge, resolve doubts, and promote independent and responsible study habits.

earlyStimulation.title: Early Stimulation
earlyStimulation.content:
Programs designed to enhance the holistic development of babies from the earliest days of life.
Through sensory, motor, and cognitive activities, we stimulate curiosity,
coordination, and emotional connection in a setting specially designed for their age and needs.

extracurricularActivities.title: Extracurricular Classes
extracurricularActivities.content:
A range of options for students to develop their talents and interests.
Music, sports, languages, art, and more are offered as opportunities to complement their education and
strengthen important skills like discipline, creativity, and teamwork.

outdoorSpaces.title: Outdoor Spaces
outdoorSpaces.content:
Natural areas designed for play, exploration, and learning.
Children have the opportunity to connect with nature, develop motor skills,
release energy, and improve their physical and emotional well-being in a safe and stimulating environment.

dynamicLearning.title: Dynamic Learning
dynamicLearning.content:
An innovative pedagogical approach that combines practical and interactive methods to make learning meaningful and engaging.
Through projects, group experiences, and creative activities, students develop critical thinking,
curiosity, and life skills.
